shoppingcart.cartdetail

Class CartDetailPageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • io.sphere.sdk.play.controllers.ShopController
          • common.controllers.SunriseController
            • shoppingcart.common.CartController
              • shoppingcart.cartdetail.CartDetailPageController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    @Singleton
public class CartDetailPageController
extends CartController
    Shows and modifies the contents of the cart.
